version_description:
- Smoother drawing.
- Bug fixes.

- Fixed instagram sharing.
- Can now stabilise in the background.

- You can now tap on the #loopsieoftheday (or the author) to see it on Instagram.
- Fixed a bug that caused the app to crash when choosing the "more" action during sharing.

- Performance improvements
- Bug fixes

The app has been completely revamped in order to take full advantage of the powerful hardware of the new devices and technologies.

The video is now instantly stabilized and available for editing. You no longer need to wait for it, thanks to the exp

- Bug fixes.
- Better user experience.
- Added the option to remove the watermark from the share screen
- Fixed annoying bug that made the app crash while recording.

- Some minor improvements
- Bug fix
- Graphical update
- Updated privacy policy.
- Bug fix
- bug fix
- bug fix
- bug fix
- bug fix

Hold yourself tight for this one.
We have added many features with this update, just to name a few: video trimming, still frame selection, brush hardness control...
Hope you like them.
Bug fix
Bug fix

Inform all your social media followers that you are going to post some amazing Loopsies from now on, as the import feature is here!
Yes, you read that right... You can now import videos or live photos inside Loopsie and create stunning moving pictures

You can now zoom in even further in order to achieve that pixel perfect accuracy you need for your masterpiece!
Also some bug fixing.
This update includes some minor changes and bug fixes.
Bug fixes and overall improvements

Thank you for using Loopsie!
We would love to hear your thoughts on this updgrade, please email us at ios.support@loopsie.it

This update includes:

- Bug fix

Thank you for using Loopsie!
We would love to hear your thoughts on this update, please email us at ios.support@loopsie.it

This update introduces two new camera effects:
- Smart Long Exposure
- Light Trails

You can now save your loo

- Chinese (Simplified)
- Chinese (Traditional)
- Japanese
- Korean
